source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_00<tab>Aethelmaer wants you to hold on to the button.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_00<tab>フォールゴウドのエーセルメール牙曹長は、冒険者にボタンを預けたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_01<tab>Aethelmaer entrusts you with the lily button, thus far the most promising lead in the murder investigation, and suggests that you show it to Miounne at the Adventurers' Guild in Gridania. Perhaps she will be able to recognize the sigil it bears.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_01<tab>エーセルメール牙曹長から、怪事件解決の手がかりとなる、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>を譲り受けた。グリダニアのカーラインカフェのマスター「ミューヌ」なら、何かわかるかもしれない。「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>」を見せてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_02<tab>While Miounne appreciates the button's exquisite craftsmanship, she is unfamiliar with its sigil. She suggests you show it to Bernadette, the keen-eyed sentry who stands guard at the aetheryte plaza.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_02<tab>ミューヌに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>は、心当たりがないようだった。エーテライト・プラザを警備している「ベルナデット」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>」を見せてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_03<tab>Unfortunately, Bernadette does not recognize the lily sigil. In her turn, she suggests that you have it examined by Wood Wailer Ceinguled, who stands before the Lancers' Guild.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_03<tab>ベルナデッドも<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>には心当たりがないようだ。鬼哭隊屯所前にいる「セイングレド」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>」を見せてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_04<tab>Ceinguled recalls having seen a man named Ursandel wearing an identical button upon the breast of his jacket. You will find him by the entrance to the Gentry's Ward, northwest of the Lancers' Guild.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_04<tab>セイングレドは、名士区の入り口で、似たボタンをつけていた男をみたそうだ。鬼哭隊屯所の北西にある名士区の前にいる「ウルサンデル」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>」を見せてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_05<tab>Ursandel instantly recognizes the sigil as that of the old and proud Dartancours family. With a sigh of resignation, he agrees to reveal the truth behind the mysterious murders...on the condition that you promise to help him with what will most certainly be an unsavory task.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_SEQ_05<tab>ウルサンデルは、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>が「ダルタンクール家」の印であることを知っていた。ウルサンデルに、怪事件の被害者の死の真相を聞こう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_TODO_00<tab>Show the lily button to Miounne.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_TODO_00<tab>カーラインカフェのミューヌに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>を見せる

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_TODO_01<tab>Show the lily button to Bernadette.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_TODO_01<tab>ベルナデットに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>を見せる

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_TODO_02<tab>Show the lily button to Ceinguled.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_TODO_02<tab>セイングレドに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>を見せる

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_TODO_03<tab>Show the lily button to Ursandel.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_TODO_03<tab>ウルサンデルに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F601 /var>を見せる

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_AETHELMAER_000_000<tab>I would have you hold on to the lily button. You will need it to continue your investigation.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_AETHELMAER_000_000死体がつけていた「」をお前に預ける。
この怪事件を追っていけば、お前が探している、
「仮面の男」に近づくことができるかもしれん。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_AETHELMAER_000_001<tab>While it isn't standard procedure to entrust key evidence to individuals, you have proven yourself reliable and resourceful in this matter. I see no reason why you shouldn't carry on your work.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_AETHELMAER_000_001人探しのためとはいえ、
お前は近隣の魔物討伐にも一役買ってくれたからな。
事件の大事な証拠品だが、今回は特別だ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_AETHELMAER_000_002<tab>If I might make a suggestion, you may wish to take the button to Gridania and have it examined by Miounne. Mayhap someone in her vast network of contacts can shed light upon its sigil.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_AETHELMAER_000_002……そうだな、まずはこのボタンを持って
グリダニアの冒険者ギルドで聞きこみをしてはどうだ。
冒険者ならではの情報網もあるだろう？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_MIOUNNE_000_010<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. By your grim expression, I suspect you aren't here for scones and herb tea.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_MIOUNNE_000_010おや、)) (( )) 03 /var>)) (()) (( )) 02 /var>)) (()) (( )) 03 /var>)) /var>じゃないか！
僕のハーブティーを飲みに来た……って様子じゃないね。
どうかしたのかい？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_MIOUNNE_000_011<tab>Well, isn't this a lovely little button. The engraving is quite exquisite─artisan-level quality, I would say. Where did you say you found this? ...On a dead body? <var 1A 02 /var>Lovely<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_MIOUNNE_000_011綺麗なボタンだね。
かなり上等なものに見えるけれど……
彫られているのは、白百合か。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_MIOUNNE_000_012<tab>Anyway, I'm afraid I do not recognize the lily sigil. You will have to find the answer the old-fashioned way─by asking around. You could do worse than beginning with Bernadette, over by the aetheryte plaza. She has a sharp pair of eyes, that one.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_MIOUNNE_000_012残念だけど、心当たりがないな。
エーテライト・プラザを警備している「ベルナデット」なら
同じものをつけた人を見ているかもしれないね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_BERNADETTE_000_020<tab>Need help tracking down the owner of a button? That's certainly not a request I receive on a regular basis. Well, go on, then─show me what you have.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_BERNADETTE_000_020ボタンの持ち主を探している？
ここを行き来する冒険者なら、大抵は覚えているけれど。
……どんなボタンなのかしら？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_BERNADETTE_000_021<tab>Hmmm... Seems to be some manner of decorative button, reminiscent of those worn by the families of old, though I cannot claim to know its sigil. However, I can say with certainty that the white lily is a recurring theme in Gridanian culture.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_BERNADETTE_000_021飾りボタンみたいね……
残念だけど、心当たりはないわね。
それに、白百合はグリダニア市民が好む意匠よ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_BERNADETTE_000_022<tab>Alas, I do not know who would make a personal sigil of it. If there is a soul in Gridania who does, it would be Ceinguled over at the Lancers' Guild. The woman makes a point of knowing all the citizens on a forename basis.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_BERNADETTE_000_022グリダニア市民のことなら、
旧市街を担当している「セイングレド」の方が詳しいわ。
鬼哭隊屯所の前にいるはずだから、聞いてみたら？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_CEINGULED_000_030<tab>Bernadette believes that I can help you? Well, that is a rather bold assumption to make. I will try to assist, never you fear, but whether aught comes of it is another matter. Now, then, what do you require of me?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_CEINGULED_000_030ベルナデットが私を頼れと？
はぁ……どんな用件なんだ。
私は彼女ほど、無駄に記憶力がいいわけじゃないぞ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_CEINGULED_000_031<tab>Fascinating... Work of this quality is rarely seen in the hands of ordinary Gridanians. The owner of this button is most certainly well-to-do. You may wish to take your search to the Gentry's Ward, northwest of here.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_CEINGULED_000_031これほど贅（ぜい）を凝らした装飾品は、
グリダニアの一般市民には縁遠いものだ。
つけるとすれば「名士区」の……

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_CEINGULED_000_032<tab>Wait. A memory comes to me. Of late, there has been a man who is perpetually seated at the bench by the ward's entrance. His name is Ursandel, and I distinctly recall seeing a markedly similar button upon the breast of his jacket. I daresay <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> can tell you a thing or two about it.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_CEINGULED_000_032待てよ、そういえば名士区の入り口に、
これとよく似たボタンをつけた男がいたな。
場所はわかるか？　橋の先の三叉路を北だ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_URSANDEL_000_040<tab>I do not believe we are acquainted. Pray leave me to my thoughts.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_URSANDEL_000_040貴方様は……？
わたくしに、何かご用でしょうか。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_URSANDEL_000_041<tab><gasp> The sigil of the Dartancours family! How...how is it that you came to be in possession of this button?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_URSANDEL_000_041ああ……ああ……！
見間違うはずもございません！
気高き白百合の意匠は「ダルタンクール家」が掲げる印！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_URSANDEL_000_042<tab>...From the body of a murdered woman? H-Her face...was it marred in any way?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_URSANDEL_000_042貴方様は、これをどちらで？
……無残な死体から？
ああ、その答えだけは、聞きたくありませんでした！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_URSANDEL_000_043<tab>I had feared as much... <sigh> I can no longer feign ignorance. I shall reveal to you the truth of the deaths, but on one condition: you promise to put an end to my lady's madness and free her from her torment.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA905_00800_URSANDEL_000_043もはや、知らぬふりはできますまい……。
哀れな娘たちの死の真相と、ダルタンクール家の……
アマンディヌお嬢様の悲劇について、お話しましょう。
